subject: Diving and Divers
Lakes
Ships and Shipping
lead_paragraph: The prospect of scuba diving in the Northeast may not conjure visions of crystal clear water, but there is an equally enticing siren of underwater adventure: shipwrecks.
snippet: The prospect of scuba diving in the Northeast may not conjure visions of crystal clear water, but there is an equally enticing siren of underwater adventure: shipwrecks.
